backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing brief summaries of key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting page metadata and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main landing page React component featuring header, hero section with generated images, and initial layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication with login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder React Query hook structure prepared for future backend calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet applying custom warm theme colors, fonts, and Tailwind base layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing providers and rendering the root React component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, warm color palette, shadows, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature definitions, image requirements, and overall setup state. Contains existing landing-page and theme features but no new feature requests.
